task.title: Signing up for an AWS account

context.p: To use Amazon Web Services (AWS), you will need to sign up for an AWS account. If you already have an AWS account, you can skip to Installing the AWS CLI.

step.cmd: Open , and the choose Create an AWS Account.

step.info: Part of the sign-up procedure involves receiving a phone call and entering a PIN using the phone keypad.

taskbody.result: AWS sends you a confirmation email after the sign-up process is complete. At any time you can view your current account activity and manage your account by going to and clicking My Account/Console.
